text: Wild Stallion is a 1952 American western film directed by Lewis D. Collins and starring Ben Johnson, Edgar Buchanan and Martha Hyer.Pitts p.400 The film's sets were designed by the art director Martin Obzina. ==Cast== * Ben Johnson as Dan Light * Edgar Buchanan as John Wintergreen * Martha Hyer as Caroline Cullen * Hayden Rorke as Maj. Cullen * Hugh Beaumont as Capt. Wilmurt * Orley Lindgren as Young Dan Light * Don Haggerty as Sgt. Keach * Susan Odin as Caroline - as a Child * I. Stanford Jolley as Bill Cole * Barbara Wooddell as Abigail Light * John Halloran as John Light * Don Garner as Cpl. Thompson * John Hart as Cavalry Corporal * Perc Launders as Army Doctor * William Newell as Sergeant * Bob Peoples as Cavalryman * Stanley Price as Cavalry Sentry * Lee Roberts as Cavalry Corporal * Elizabeth Russell as Dan's School Teacher ==References== ==Bibliography== * Pitts, Michael R. Western Movies: A Guide to 5,105 Feature Films.
